name: Talismanic Sage
summary: You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known.
description:
You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known. Normally, affixing more than one talisman to an item causes the talismans to be suppressed, but when you Affix a Talisman, you can specially treat one item you're working on, allowing it to have two active talismans at once. This special treatment ends if you use Affix a Talisman to treat a new item for this ability.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
